name: Shree Balaji Steel Industries
description: Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink, PVC Flushi
overview:
Incorporated in the year 2008, at New Delhi (India), we, Shree Balaji Steel Industries, are Manufacturer, Trader and Supplier of a wide range of Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink, PVC Flushing Cistern, Toilet Seat Cover, Waste Coupling etc.

Our Team: Our highly experienced and diligent team of experts assists us in offering high quality products.

Infrastructure: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility equipped with advance manufacturing technologies and machines that enables us to manufacture the best quality products.

Client Satisfaction: Owing to our meticulous efforts, we have established ourselves strongly in the international market. Backed by skilled and experienced professionals, we are able to design our wide range of products in compliance with client specifications.

Why Us: We have vast industrial experience and rich expertise in the production of Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink, Sink, Kitchen Sinks, etc.
